settings.custom_faq_question: What's the difference between OEM and aftermarket auto parts?
settings.custom_faq_answer:
OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer parts are crafted by the vehicle's maker, whereas aftermarket parts are manufactured by third-party
companies. Although OEM parts usually come at a higher cost, they are recognized for their potential superior quality and precise fit.

settings.custom_faq_question: How do I find the right auto parts or engine oil for my vehicle
settings.custom_faq_answer: To simplify the process, we offer a user-friendly vehicle lookup feature on our website. You can usually find it on our homepage or in the search bar. Simply enter your vehicle's make, model, and year, and let the tool do the work

settings.custom_faq_question: Is this part compatible with my vehicle?
settings.custom_faq_answer: We provide compatibility information for each product based on your vehicle's make, model, and year. You can also use our vehicle lookup feature for quick verification.

settings.custom_faq_question: What is the warranty or return policy for this part?
settings.custom_faq_answer: Our warranty and return policy details can be found on our website. We aim to provide you with a hassle-free experience in case the part is defective or doesn't fit

settings.custom_faq_question: How much will shipping cost, and how long will it take to receive my order?
settings.custom_faq_answer: Shipping costs and estimated delivery times vary. You can find this information during the checkout process.

settings.custom_faq_question: Do you offer any discounts or promotions for this part?
settings.custom_faq_answer: Check our promotions and discounts section on our website for any ongoing offers, coupon codes, or special deals.

settings.custom_faq_question: Can I track my order once it's been shipped?
settings.custom_faq_answer: Yes, you will receive a tracking number via email once your order is shipped, allowing you to monitor its progress.

settings.custom_faq_question: Can I return or exchange the part if it doesn't fit my vehicle or meet my expectations?
settings.custom_faq_answer: Our return and exchange policy outlines the procedures for returning or exchanging parts that do not meet your expectations or fit your vehicle.

settings.custom_faq_question: Do you provide customer support for assistance with product selection or inquiries?
settings.custom_faq_answer: Yes, our customer support team is here to assist you. Contact us via phone, email, or live chat during our business hours.

settings.detail_title_9: What type of payments do you accept?

settings.detail_title_2: What factors influence the cost of an Engine Oil Change?
settings.accordion_text_2: The price of an engine oil change is influenced by various factors, including the oil brand, your car's make and model, and the size of your car's engine
settings.detail_title_3: Whatis included in the Engine Oil Change Service?
settings.accordion_text_3:
Our comprehensive Engine Oil Change Service features a high-quality oil change, replacement ofthe oil filter, and a complimentary 10-point Vehicle Check. This check includes aninspection of the air filter, cabin filter, wiper blades, steering fluid,
brake fluid levels, coolant levels, windscreen washer fluid, as well as a tire
pressure inspection.
settings.detail_title_4: Howdo I locate my engine size?
settings.accordion_text_4:
To find your engine size, open the bonnet/hood and inspect the engine bay for
an etched or raised marking that displays the engine's size. Some vehicles may
have an EPA/VIN/Chassis sticker under the hood that specifies the engine size.
You can also refer to your vehicle owner's manual, focusing on sections labeled
'Specifications' or Mechanical Information.' Alternatively, check the model markings at the rear of your car, as the engine size might be indicated there.
